directions: Whisk labneh, allspice, and 1 1/2 teaspoons Aleppo pepper in a medium bowl; season with salt and black pepper. Drizzle with oil and top with more Aleppo pepper.
ingredients: 1 1/2 teaspoons Aleppo pepper, plus more for serving
Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper
title: Spiced Labneh
